text.div:
Dengue Virus Infection (Tests for dengue virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    60262-3 Dengue virus 1 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    60418-1 Dengue virus 4 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    60419-9 Dengue virus 3 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    60420-7 Dengue virus 2 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    6386-7 Dengue virus DNA [Presence] in Serum by Probe
    6387-5 Dengue virus DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    77958-7 Dengue virus 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 RNA [Identifier] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    7855-0 Dengue virus 1+2+3+4 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    81150-5 Dengue virus 1+2+3+4 5' UTR RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    81151-3 Dengue virus 1+2+3+4 5' UTR RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    82383-1 Dengue virus 2+4 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    82384-9 Dengue virus 1+3 RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    88188-8 Dengue virus 1+2+3+4 RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    88189-6 Dengue virus 1+2+3+4 RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    88203-5 Dengue virus 1 and 2 and 3 and 4 RNA [Identifier] in Serum or Blood by NAA with probe detection
